component.summary: Chat with your friends from other platforms

description.p: We're building the only chat app on Earth

ul.li: Communicate with people everywhere! Using Matrix Bridge

description.p: This wrapper is not officially endorsed by the Beeper Team.
Images and video attachments are now shown in the composer
You can now select an emoji skin tone by hovering on an emoji that supports skin tones.
Read receipts for chats will now display in a way closer to their native app
Forwarding a message when the right panel was open would crash the app
HEIC images would not preview correctly
Added ability to change your email address in general settings

issues.p: Upgrading was prevented in certain cases due to an error
